Hire an Esquire | Web Developer Roles | Pittsburgh, PA | Full Time | ONSITE | https://hireanesquire.com/careers/

We're looking for strong frontend, backend, and full-stack web developers to help us build the next iteration of our SPA. The ideal candidate will be detail-oriented and have a penchant for testing, refactoring, and writing high-quality code using the latest industry-standard best practices.

You will be working with the product team located in downtown Pittsburgh, PA. This role will be interfacing heavily with the CTO and UX Designer to design, build, and test new features for our application.

Our Stack:

Backend:

    * Python / Django
    * Django Rest Framework
Frontend:

    * React 16 (ES6)
    * Redux
    * Jest
Currently Hiring:

* Full Stack Developer: https://hireanesquireteam.applytojob.com/apply/1Mm343jLj0/Fu...

* Backend Developer: https://hireanesquireteam.applytojob.com/apply/3IfVLLYv1F/Ba...
